sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const TermsOfService = () => { return (

Terms of Service

1. Introduction

Welcome to our Terms of Service!

2. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using our website, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions, you may not access the website or use any services.

3. Website Use

You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms of Service. You are prohibited from using the website in a way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair any part of the website.

4. Products and Services

Our bakery offers a variety of products and services through the website. All descriptions of products or product pricing are subject to change at any time without notice, at our sole discretion.

5. Ordering and Purchases

When you place an order with us, you agree to provide accurate and current information about yourself. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order placed for any reason, at our sole discretion.

6. Privacy Policy

Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our website, you consent to the collection and use of this information.

7. Intellectual Property

All content included on this website, such as text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of our bakery or its content suppliers and protected by copyright laws.

8. Limitation of Liability

In no case shall our bakery, its directors, officers, employees, affiliates, agents, contractors, interns, suppliers, service providers or licensors be liable for any injury, loss, claim, or any direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, special, or consequential damages of any kind.

9. Indemnity

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless our bakery and our affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, contractors, licensors, service providers, subcontractors, suppliers, interns, and employees, harmless from any claim or demand.

10. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check our website periodically for changes.

11. Governing Law

These Terms of Service and any separate agreements whereby we provide you services shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your State/Country].

12. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

  • Email: faithsconfectionery@gmail.com
  • Phone: +1 (123) 456-7890
  • Address: 123 Bakery Street, City, State, Zip Code
); } export default TermsOfService;
